turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello, how are you I'd like to give you some information about a great charity if you have a few minutes.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: of course i have time, please tell me.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Ok the charity is called Save the Children.  Have you ever heard about it?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: i think so, its a charity that saves children right?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Exactly. It is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries. Sounds pretty good right?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: yes its really fantastic, i love this kind of organizations that help people and do the gods job.Â¨Â´

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Right. So basically children are dying from hunger and things like no shelter. What this charity does is helps provide these resources in an efficient matter. How important is helping children out to you?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: i like to help childrens because it makes me feel pleasure of helping someone, children are the future we must help them.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes, as Whitney Houston once said "I believe that children are our future, teach them well and watch them lead the way."  If you were able to give a monetary donation it would help essential to help ensuring children\'s rights to health, education and safety.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: i would like to help with this charity, i want to give a little amount of money when i have the opportunity .

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I understand. I think its great that you would like to help. You know, every little bit will help a child to achieve a better life.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: but i dont know how much a normal person donates, you will donate in this charity?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes, the research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: great, if it is like this i would like to donate $1 for this charity.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2).

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: i said i would like to donate $1, i would be happy to donate from my bonus because i know the money will help someone.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Wow, that is a generous donation. You are a good person and I'm here to ensure you the money will be going to a good place for children that need it.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: thank you very much, you will donate today too? or just i can donate?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I am here to help in any way possible. After this chat you will be prompted for the donation. Thank you again for your generous donation and sleep well knowing your donation has helped a child somewhere in this big world.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: thank you too, it was a pleasure talking to you, you made me donate today with the wonderfool way you talked to me.
